level.text: It is unlawful for an individual or a business knowingly to use coercion to cause a person to provide labor or services.
It is unlawful for an individual or a business knowingly to place or keep any person in debt bondage.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in § 14-311, § 22-1836, § 22-1837, and § 22-1840.
